subject: Re: [junit] Junit and Ant
msgSnippet: I know of a couple of books that may help: Java Tools for Extreme Programming (note bias) :) http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/047120708X/ Java
messageBody:
I know of a couple of books that may help:

Java Tools for Extreme Programming (note bias) :)

http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/047120708X/

Java Development With Ant

http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1930110588/

(ok, I'm also biased on this on, as I worked with Erik Hatcher, but it's
quite good!)

Cheers,

Nick

From: "David Postill" <david.postill@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 04, 2002 8:51 AM
Subject: Re: [junit] Junit and Ant

> On Thu, 4 Jul 2002 18:04:48 +0200, you wrote:
>
> | Let me rephrase my question:
> | I have a web app (using JBuilder 5 and Ant). I have a JUnitTest for this
> | app, and I want the build process of the main project to run the
AllTests
> | for it/
> | Where can I get information on 'how to'?
>
